decks.notes: The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly build up a board presence with efficient creatures like Badgermole Cub and Icetill Explorer, while using abilities like Mightform Harmonizer and Earthbender Ascension to boost their power. The deck also includes tools like Fabled Passage, Hushwood Verge, and Escape Tunnel to ensure mana consistency and smooth gameplay. With aggressive creatures like Sazh's Chocobo and Llanowar Elves, combined with potential finishers like Royal Treatment and Bristly Bill, Spine Sower, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with fast and powerful threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Burnout Bashtronaut and Emberheart Challenger, as well as efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Helix, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. Boros Charm provides additional versatility and reach, while Inspiring Vantage and Sacred Foundry ensure consistent mana sources for the deck's red and white spells. Overall, the deck aims to win the game through early aggression and consistent damage output.

This Izzet Control deck focuses on manipulating the board state through various spells and abilities while also drawing cards to maintain card advantage. It aims to control the tempo of the game by bouncing opponent's permanents, countering spells, and setting up powerful combos. The deck utilizes a mix of removal, card draw, and mana acceleration to out-value the opponent and eventually win through a combination of burn spells and powerful creatures. The key strategy is to efficiently control the game while gradually building towards a win condition with powerful spells and abilities.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient creatures and buffs. Utilizing cards like Llanowar Elves to ramp up mana quickly and Earthbender Ascension to boost creature power, this deck aims to put early pressure on the opponent and maintain board control. With a mix of creatures, spells, and land ramp, this deck seeks to build a wide board presence and continuously apply pressure to force the opponent to react defensively.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of spells and abilities that allow you to disrupt your opponent's strategy while building up your own resources. By utilizing cards like Boomerang Basics and Torch the Tower, you can prevent your opponent from establishing a strong board presence while also dealing damage. Quantum Riddler and Stormchaser's Talent help you draw into more resources and answers, while cards like Soul-Guide Lantern and Cryogen Relic provide disruption and graveyard hate. With this control-focused strategy, you aim to outlast and outmaneuver your opponent to secure victory.

The main concept of this Izzet Control deck is to maintain control of the game using a combination of card advantage, powerful spells, and versatile lands. By utilizing talents, passages, and techniques, the deck aims to outvalue and outtempo the opponent, while also having access to a variety of removal and card draw options. Through careful resource management and strategic decision-making, the deck seeks to establish and maintain board control, ultimately allowing it to dictate the pace and outcome of the game.

The main concept of this Jeskai Control deck is to effectively control the board and opponent's resources while generating card advantage through draw spells like Consult the Star Charts and Meticulous Archive. Cards like Day of Judgment and Lightning Helix provide removal and life gain, while powerful finishers like Elspeth, Storm Slayer and Jeskai Revelation can close out the game. The deck also utilizes lands with cycling abilities like Riverpyre Verge and Sunbillow Verge to ensure consistent mana fixing and card draw options. Overall, the strategy revolves around outlasting the opponent and winning through incremental advantage.

The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with low-cost creatures and utilizing powerful creature buffs like Gene Pollinator and Nature's Rhythm to overwhelm the opponent. It also includes cards like Mockingbird and Spider Manifestation to generate additional creature tokens and maintain pressure on the opponent. The deck's top-end threats like Craterhoof Behemoth and Surrak, Elusive Hunter provide a strong finisher to close out the game. With a mix of aggressive creatures, support spells, and powerful finishers, this Simic Aggro deck aims to outpace and outmuscle opponents in the early to mid-game.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of removal spells and card draw to outvalue your opponent. By playing a mix of instant speed removal, counterspells, and card draw, you aim to stay ahead on board presence and card advantage. Utilizing cards like Abandon Attachments, Boomerang Basics, and Firebending Lesson to control the board while drawing cards with Accumulate Wisdom and Stormchaser's Talent. The deck also includes some finishers like Artist's Talent and Combustion Technique to close out games.

The main focus of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creature cards like Burnout Bashtronaut, Hired Claw, and Nova Hellkite, while also utilizing a mix of burn spells like Lightning Helix, Burst Lightning, and Shock to both control the board and deal direct damage. The deck aims to maintain a fast pace and apply constant pressure on the opponent, utilizing cards like Boros Charm and Slickshot Show-Off to maximize damage output and maintain board presence. This strategy is supported by efficient mana sources like Inspiring Vantage and Sacred Foundry.

This Simic Aggro deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence with efficient creatures like Badgermole Cub and Mockingbird, supported by powerful spells like Nature's Rhythm to accelerate mana production and Ouroboroid for resilience. Utilizing Gene Pollinator and Quantum Riddler for card advantage and tempo, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. The inclusion of cards like Bramble Familiar and Spider-Sense provide additional versatility and protection, allowing for aggressive plays while still maintaining board control.

The deck focuses on utilizing fast creatures and generating mana efficiently in order to swarm the board and overwhelm opponents quickly. The combination of aggressive creatures like Ouroboroid and Mockingbird with mana dorks like Llanowar Elves and Gene Pollinator allows for explosive early-game plays. Spider-Sense and Nature's Rhythm provide additional tempo and disruption to control opponents. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Craterhoof Behemoth and Tyvar, the Pummeler to close out games. Overall, the deck aims to maintain constant pressure and outpace opponents in a fast-paced aggro strategy.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using a combination of removal spells, card draw, and counterspells to mitigate threats from the opponent. With the ability to consistently draw cards, gain life, and wipe the board when needed, this deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through attrition. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's game plan, the Jeskai Control deck aims to control the pace of the game and emerge victorious in the late game with powerful finishers like Jeskai Revelation and Ultima.

The key focus of this deck is to overwhelm and outpace your opponent with quick and aggressive plays, utilizing a mix of creatures and spells from the Dimir faction. By combining the strength of cards like Cecil, Dark Knight and Floodpits Drowner with efficient removal spells like Shoot the Sheriff and Stab, you aim to control the board while dealing consistent damage to your opponent. With cards like Gloomlake Verge and Watery Grave providing mana fixing and flexibility, this deck aims to curve out smoothly and dominate the battlefield early on.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent's life total using aggressive red creatures and burn spells. The deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures like Hired Claw and Fanatical Firebrand, as well as efficient spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike. Additionally, the deck includes powerful dragons like Nova Hellkite to pressure the opponent. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Shock and maintain card advantage with cards like Riverpyre Verge and Soulstone Sanctuary.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By using cards that provide early aggression like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, along with creatures that can control the board like Tishana's Tidebinder and Cecil, Dark Knight, the deck aims to pressure the opponent and disrupt their strategy at the same time. The inclusion of cards like Bitter Triumph and Shoot the Sheriff also adds versatility and can help to push through damage or deal with threats efficiently.
